description: a(n)^3 is smallest cube containing exactly n 7's.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cubic Number
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{i = 0}, While[DigitCount[i^3][[7]] != n, i++ ]; i]; - Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 27 2006
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999.
extensions: One more term from Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 27 2006
